questionText: Explain the difference between hardware and software using examples.
Study the diagram below showing parts of a system unit and explain the function of any two labelled components.
Describe the steps involved in booting a computer.
Use the diagram below to explain the difference between input and output devices.
Explain how to create, rename, and delete a folder on a computer.
The image below shows a computer desktop. Identify any three features and explain their use.
Using the diagram below, explain what a file path is and why it is important.
Explain the process of copying and moving files using both keyboard shortcuts and the right-click method.
The diagram shows icons commonly found on the desktop. Identify and explain the use of any two.
Explain the steps to safely shut down and restart a computer, and describe what happens during each process.
